util
Class LinearRegressionTest

java.lang.Object
  util.LinearRegressionTest

public class LinearRegressionTest
extends java.lang.Object

Another idea about the voting process is to use regression analysis to consider half of the sample.out as training set and the other half as a test set. With gradient descent method, we could obtain the weight of each method mentioned in this system.

getSum

public double getSum(java.util.List<util.LinearRegressionTest.Node> arr,
                     double a,
                     double b,
                     double c,
                     double d,
                     int x)
Parameters:
x - when x==0, we return the sum of the parameter x0's cost derivative, and so it is with x==1,x==2,x==3. When x==4, we return the square of the sum, in order to calculate the minimum cost.
